attributes.action: Reduce IMMEIATELEY the fuel duty across all fuels.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As crude does not cost any more to extract now than it did 2 years ago, why have our fuel prices gone through the roof in the last 18 months.
I call for an IMMEDIATE and Substancial reduction in the fuel duty to off set the racketeering by the oil companies, and help for individuals to convert their cars to run on bio-diesel like the rebate given to LPG gas fitments.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
